metadata.title: CVE-2024-35948 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  bcachefs: Check for journal entries overruning end of sb clean section  Fix a missing bounds check in superblock validation.  Note that we don't yet have repair code for this case - repair code for individual items is generally low priority, since the whole superblock is checksummed, validated prior to write, and we have backups.
